alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:34PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lauderdale, western Colbert and western Franklin Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 133 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pickwick Landing State Park to near Pratts Friendship. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Red Bay, Cherokee, Underwood-Petersville, Belgreen, Vina, Hodges and Waterloo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
